__e: I wasn't expecting to see you or your... deadly light back so soon.
I was struck by this terrible sense of my own mortality, of dying without leaving something of myself behind.
My man, I was told I had a spot on the floor tonight, but it seems that I've committed the cardinal sin of being early.
Okay, there is a killer virus out there that only we can stop.
It wasn't a fatal accident anyway.
You can't even say who you are because, you don't know maybe the person you're talking to maybe they're like your mortal enemy in the wars.
You're just a mortal, how would you know?
You see, that's the mortal in you, Peter.
I want you to rejoin our family, take the body of a mortal, and we can all be happy again.
Oh, well, one of us is mortal and it ain't him.
What is the proper name of the offspring of a human and a god?
I shouldn't even be here, thanks to that deathtrap.
But you're right. He's a machine... and you don't keep a deadly machine around.
Mortal life means nothing to them.
This week has been murder for me.
He has proved a deadly menace to the King's peace.
You can't be sure that you're going to die.
